text: Lovendegem is a former municipality in the Belgian province of East Flanders. On 1 January 2019, Lovendegem, Waarschoot and Zomergem were merged into the new municipality of Lievegem. In 2007, 9393 people lived there. It is at 51° 05 North, 03° 36 East. == References == Category:Former municipalities of East Flanders
title: Lovendegem
